title: The Fireside Book of Dog Stories
description: Stories about dogs from well-known writers James Thurber, Jack London, Booth Tarkington, John Galsworthy, W.H. Hudson, Alexander Woollcott, Walter A. Dyer, Richard Harding Davis, Anatole France, Norman Corwin, Vereen Bell, E.B. White, Maurice Maeterlinck, James Street, D.H. Lawrence, Lord Dunsany, O. Henry, Jack Alan, Stephen Crane, Bertha Damon, Thomas Mann, Louis Untermeyer, Don Marquis, Walter D. Edmonds, Emma-Lindsay Squier, G.B. Stern, Elsie Singmaster, Rudyard Kipling, Eric Knight, MacKinlay Kantor, Albert Payson Terhune, Hugh Walpole, and Robert Louis Stevenson.
author: Jack Goodman
